text:
Brahmacharya— In his home world, it was the lifelong vow of celibacy
that Sanat Kumara, the 'Eternal Youth', swore alongside his companions.

Once, there were those who
sought to disturb his ascetic purity.

It is said that he rejected those who fanned the flames of desire and
forbade them from entering his Ashrama, his place of training.

After coming to this Tokyo and broadening his horizons,
it can be said that his sensibilities have gradually shifted, but—

Even so, his compatibility with 'alluring'
existences remains exceptionally poor.

He is skilled at turning fights into a 'No Game',
the kind of battle where you trade blows on a sunset riverbank, understand each other
through your souls, and render the concept of winning or losing meaningless.

In a fight, no matter how boastful of strength or how powerful the enemy,
they hold little meaning before Sanat Kumara.

The guild he has long belonged to values this trait
highly and has granted him a special 'Privilege' because of it.

However, that is strictly within the scope
of the 'Game' as recognized for an 'Eternal Youth'.

At the very least, he does not
consider 'adult romance' to be a game.

To put it simply, Sanat Kumara becomes completely powerless
against an opponent possessing the 'charm of an adult'.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Guh!
In this serious match... I admit... my defeat!!

name: Suzuka
text:
—!?
What on earth just happened?

name: Taishakuten
text:
I have no idea. Sanat Kumara suddenly
declared his surrender to Baphomet—!?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Hmmm, now this is strange.
I suppose... she's struck Sanat's 'only weakness'?

The incident occurred during the rehearsal for the
'Tag Match' program to be held in a few days.

They were supposed to have been brought to the ring not for a match,
but simply to check things like the lighting.

However, immediately after the two faced each other and exchanged a few brief words,
Sanat Kumara suddenly fell to his knees and unilaterally raised the white flag.

name: Baphomet
text:
Well... I did not intend for that to happen.
I was simply curious about what lies within your heart.

name: Baphomet
text:
I touched upon your 'inner devil' for just a moment...
My apologies, I should have asked for permission beforehand.

name: Baphomet
text:
So, once more— May I observe you closely?
If you could, General Manager Sanat Kumara-sama—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
W-Wait!
Do not come any closer than that!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I have no resistance to exposing my physical vulnerabilities.
But as for my mental vulnerabilities—!!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
...Just as I thought. Due to the nature of Sanat's 'Rule', he can endure almost
anything as long as both sides are exposing their 'inner selves' to one another.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
His 'Rule' is a tool where the opponent is hurt as much as he is.
The reverse is also true, making it perfect for settling a 'Game'.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
But if someone peeks inside his heart and steps in,
it's more than he can bear, isn't it?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Unlike hurting each other, there's no limit to giving each other pleasure.
It'll go all the way to the end! Kaka!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
S-Stop it!! To do that so suddenly after we've met...!
The Ether Light is invading my 'Sanctuary' in reverse—!!?

Chapter 2:
Go! The Pure-Hearted Head of Asakusa

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And so, because of this,
I am stepping down as General Manager!

name: Sanat Kumara
text: <p2 style="font-size: 130%">And, I am also stepping down as the head of the Asokenkai!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text: <p2 style="font-size: 130%">Of course, I will not participate in today's program either!!!

name: Umamichi Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Eeeehhhhh—!!?

Thus, the next day— Having gathered the people of Asakusa, Sanat Kumara
briefly explained the events of the rehearsal and made his resolute declaration.

name: Jinn
text:
W-What's this about!? I thought we were meeting
to discuss today's program... But a retirement declaration!?

name: Jagannath
text:
What's up, what's up? What are you guys making such a fuss about?
Is it an incident, or did some kind of accident happen?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Hihihi! [Player], doesn't this sweet and spicy chicken
I bought over there look delicious? Here, say 'Ahh'!

options.text: Sanat-senpai, you're surprising everyone.
It does seem like an incident...
Y'golonac, at least show some interest!

text:
Hearing the even more boisterous state of the always-lively Asakusa group,
Jagannath and the others gather to see what is happening.

But the General Manager doesn't even look at Jagannath and the others.
He looks straight at [Player] and the Umamichi students as he speaks.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—If you understand my position, then there should
be nothing strange about this conclusion, right?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I am the wall that my juniors must overcome—
As the General Manager, I must always remain a superior being.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Therefore, defeat is not permitted. I won't say I've never known a loss,
but since becoming the General Manager of Asakusa and Umamichi,
I have remained undefeated.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Yes, I decided that if I ever tasted the bitterness
of defeat even once, I would step down as General Manager!

options.text: It wasn't even an official match, right!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A lighting check—
Yes, that was indeed the story.
But I ascended to the arena, and I fell to my knees...

options.text: Thank you for all your hard work until now.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, I thank you.
And I am grateful to all of you for following someone as pathetic as me for this long.

options.text: You're acting a bit too much like yourself (?).

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
What? What is that supposed to mean?
It's only natural for me to be myself at any given moment.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Well, it's a bit exaggerated, but if the man himself
thinks he lost, then it must be a total defeat. Kakaka!

name: Licho
text:
Hey, don't say it so nonchalantly, Vice-Head~
If Sanat-senpai leaves, Umamichi will be in total chaos!

name: Licho
text:
It was the General Manager who managed to pull
our rowdy place together. If that seat becomes empty...

name: Motosumi
text:
Yeah, honestly, I don't even want to think about it...
An Umamichi without the General Manager...

The tough-looking delinquents of Asakusa all plead with
eyes like abandoned dogs, begging him not to give up on them—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Of course, I have no intention of simply stepping down irresponsibly.
Rest assured, I plan to entrust the position of General Manager to Gorozaemon.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
—What was that? Spare me from such tedious things!
Sanat, I'm telling you for your own good, hurry up and reconsider?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
That's right! Putting aside the matter of the festival
head and today's program, the 'Float Clash', the position of General Manager is—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I understand your feelings well. The Float Clash is the
program that colors the opening of the Fighting Festival.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Youth collides, and their souls scatter sparks.
The creaking wooden frames, the beautiful spray of sweat, the raging heat of tradition—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
However, there should be no need at all
for the one riding that proud float to be me!

name: Motosumi
text:
No, that's why we're saying, putting aside
the float thing, don't just quit as 'General Manager'—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Indeed! For me, who should be pushing my juniors to the heights,
to ride the float and be 'pushed up' by them is putting the cart before the horse!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I have neither the qualification nor the reason to ride the float!
Rather, I alone should be the one to lift all of you onto the float!!

options.text: N-Not a single word is getting through to him!
When he gets like this, he's tough to deal with...
Sanat-kun, can you hear us~!?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And besides... It might be the right thing for me to
leave Umamichi altogether and retrain myself in another land...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
My 'Role' of pushing my juniors to the heights
can be fulfilled anywhere, regardless of the location.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Hmm? Come to think of it, why am I so fixated
on Asakusa or Umamichi in the first place...?

name: Licho
text:
W-Wait, you're heading in a completely wrong direction!
Hey, you, say something to him to snap him out of it!

options.text: Wake up, Sanat-senpai!
He's gone crazy from the shock of losing.
Then, will you come to the police too, senior?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Licho
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Why would it turn out like that!?
Don't try to scout our senior in the middle of all this confusion!

text:
It was at that moment, as the straight-laced General Manager's
straying intensified and everyone was about to lose hope—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—!!
Y-You are...!!

name: Baphomet
text:
...Oh? Everyone from the Asakusa group, Jagannath-sama,
[Player]-sama, and that person over there is—

name: Y'golonac
text:
I'm Y'golonac, head of the Kabukicho group, Kichorabu.
Hihihi. Nice to meet ya, fellow leader of a small-scale religious group?

name: Baphomet
text:
...I do not desire such a position—
No, never mind, Y'golonac-sama of Kabukicho.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
B-Baphomet...!!
The extraordinary powerhouse who defeated me...!!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Whoa, the General Manager is actually flustered...
But yeah, they definitely seem to have bad compatibility.

name: Baphomet
text:
My apologies for yesterday, Sanat Kumara-sama.
However, in you— Do pardon me.

name: Baphomet
text:
In 'you', there lurks such an interesting devil.
Likely, a devil that has been brewed over a very long time...

name: Baphomet
text:
If you would be so kind, would you let me once more confirm the
contours and feel of that 'devil' within you that you yourself have not realized?

name: Y'golonac
text:
...Hmmm? Since you put it that way,
now even Uncle is curious~?

name: Y'golonac
text:
How about it, should I drag that devil of yours out into the open?
If it's the 'opposite of pushing you to the heights', leave it to Uncle! Hihihi!

name: Jinn
text:
(—?? I should have been released from Y'golonac's 'Rule',
so why is my right shoulder getting hot again...?)

name: Jinn
text:
...Cough. I see, so you have a devilish 'worry' hidden deep in your heart?
If you were to secretly confess it to me—

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, I'll hop on this too!
So basically, you've built a 'devilish wall' in your heart, haven't you?

name: Jagannath
text:
I'm a man who's good at smashing through walls.
And I'm also great at crossing boundaries!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
No, that—
Wait! I... I...!!

name: Licho
text:
This is... literally being surrounded on all sides!?
Four people who seem to have bad compatibility with the General Manager all at once!?

Being pressed from all sides at once, sweat begins to bead on Sanat's forehead.
With deep vertical wrinkles etched between his brows, he freezes like a cornered rat—

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Do not step into my...
Into this naked heart of mine—!!

As soon as he lets out a booming shout,
he runs away from the spot at a furious pace.

options.text: Oh dear, he ran away.
Guys, don't bully him all at once!
That side of him is what makes him cute~

name: Baphomet
text:
Well... What a very innocent person.
Or did I do something wrong again?

name: Licho
text:
That man has a surprisingly childish side to him.
Pure, simple, and exceptionally stubborn.

name: Jagannath
text:
'Eternal Youth'— That is his name.
Perhaps he's the type who still expects to get presents from Santa?

options.text: Surely not... Right?
I'd actually want him to receive them!
The concept of a senior receiving presents is great...!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
It's true that I can't entirely deny it...
Maybe I'll ask him next time.

name: Jinn
text:
By the way, shouldn't you guys go after him?
The General Manager is nowhere to be seen now.

The Umamichi gang falls silent.
They seemed unexpectedly shocked by Sanat's decision to leave the school.

name: Licho
text:
...I had started taking his presence for granted before I even realized it.
Even though there's no reason for that to be the case.

name: Licho
text:
A man like him surely has many other paths besides Umamichi.
Were we perhaps... binding him down?

The Asakusa group falls completely despondent, perhaps having some realization of that.
And then, the one who spoke up forcefully was—

name: Jinn
text:
I don't think so. In any case,
you need to have a proper discussion with him once more, don't you?

name: Jinn
text:
I'm a teacher myself, but if you ask me if it's my calling,
honestly I don't have much confidence. There surely were other paths for me too.

name: Jinn
text:
But you know, even so, I'm glad I became a teacher.
Your General Manager must have felt the same way.

name: Licho
text:
That's... right. I can't believe I got weak-minded for a moment.
Everyone, let's unite with one heart and soul to persuade him!

name: Motosumi
text:
Yeah, no one else but that person can serve as our General Manager.
We have to make him reconsider somehow.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
I intended to do that from the start, though?
It's not like Sanat to just push the troublesome things onto others and disappear.

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Right! This is the time for Sarutahiko, the guide of Maraque's Pond, to shine!
I'll lead you all to where Sanat-senpai is!

Jinn's words ignited a fire in the young men of Umamichi.
They immediately begin planning to search the venue in groups.

name: Licho
text:
...Hey, pal. I'm asking this while knowing how shameful it is,
but could you help us search for Sanat-senpai too?

name: Licho
text:
If that man seriously tries to hide himself,
we might not be able to find him on our own.

options.text: If it's for Sanat-senpai's sake!
I guess I have no choice.
It's fine, right, Jagannath?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, searching for people is also a policeman's job.
If a citizen requests a search, there's no helping it.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides, it's not like I don't have
some connection with ol' Kumaraten.
鳩摩羅天 (kumaraten): the Buddhism god Sanat Kumara is based on?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Uncle will help too! I've caused you guys some trouble...
So let Uncle make up for it, okay?

name: Jinn
text:
Naturally, I'll help too. I'm in the debt of the Asakusa group,
and if you're relying on me, it's a teacher's honor to help!

name: Licho
text:
...! I owe you all!
If you find him, please contact me!

name: Baphomet
text:
...Then, would it be alright
if I also offered my meager help?

options.text: Eh, Baphomet, you too!?
The more hands the better, so I agree!
I wonder if it'll be okay for Sanat-senpai...?

name: Baphomet
text:
To my shame, it seems my uncontrollable
curiosity has led to something serious...

name: Baphomet
text:
I cannot leave my 'base' for too long, but I feel somewhat—
No, quite a lot of responsibility.

name: Baphomet
text:
Of course, I will never again commit the
rudeness of touching that person's devil without permission.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
...Well, it's a wall he needs to overcome.
It might be better to let him face her properly for his own sake.

name: Motosumi
text:
Or rather, it might be a quicker way to get
him to return as our General Manager. Since it's decided—

name: Everyone
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">Now, let the search for the Umamichi General Manager begin!!

[Player]'s group ended up acting separately
from the Umamichi students to search efficiently.

Starting the search from a nearby area, they see a
group of several people arguing at the corner of their vision.

name: Kirito
text:
That's why I'm saying, if you're putting someone on the float, Baphomet-san is fine.
She's already being worshipped, so she's the most suitable.

name: Color Gang
text:
Eh? But Baphomet can't leave the hideout at night.
You see, there'd be people there preparing for the final day.

name: Color Gang
text:
Yeah, yeah, she's saying it's no good because we'd collapse!
And, she also said the ones participating in the program are strictly us.

name: Kirito
text:
...Then, that just means you
should do it yourselves, right?

name: Kirito
text:
Well, you probably won't win against any other group, but the result
would be the same even if you put someone powerless like me on it.

name: Jinn
text:
Hmm, those are the Vice-Head of the Ikebukuro group, Kirito,
and students from the color gang... Rather, the children.

options.text: Should we try asking Kirito and the others?
I wonder if they've seen Sanat-senpai.
(Walk towards Kirito and the others)

text:
[Player] and the others approach the group.
But Kirito, not noticing their approach, continues speaking.

name: Kirito
text:
...Anyway, could you stop dragging
me into your 'game of family'?

name: Kirito
text:
I just stayed behind in underground Ikebukuro,
and you guys just stepped in and clung to me on your own.

name: Kirito
text:
Hah, if Baphomet-san hadn't come, you would
have naturally split up again. It's such a nuisance.

name: Kirito
text:
...To be honest, I don't like things like pseudo-families.
After all, they're all just make-believe.

name: Kirito
text:
I don't have time to play
along with your games, you know?

[Player] and the others stop their movement,
because someone had suddenly frozen on the spot.

name: Y'golonac
text:
(Ugh, how awkward! This is the kind of thing that hurts...
Uncle has to try to change the mood—!)

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-What was that!? Are you saying that the
relationship between Uncle and [Player] is also fake!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Though, I understand the feeling of wanting to rebel
when someone unilaterally decides you're family...

name: Kirito
text:
—Hmm. Oh, it's [Player]-san and the others.
As expected, you've already managed to charm Baphomet-san?

name: Kirito
text:
And is that annoying old man over
there your foster family or something, [Player]-san?

name: Kirito
text:
...Well, if you believe it's real, then that's fine by me.
I just hope that relationship doesn't break.

name: Baphomet
text:
...It is not admirable to speak like that to outsiders.
It is a separate thing if it was to someone in a position like me— Your family.

name: Y'golonac
text:
K-Kwah! What a way to talk!
You cheeky brat, ptooie!

name: Color Gang
text:
Geh! It's those weird cops again...!
What does it mean that even Baphomet is with them?

name: Color Gang
text:
Hmm, is that the one everyone met at
the venue yesterday? Which means, about that inci—

name: Color Gang
text:
I-Idiot! Don't say unnecessary things!
Better yet, don't even make eye contact!

Ignoring them as they whisper blatantly behind Kirito's back,
Jagannath calls out with forced cheerfulness.

name: Jagannath
text:
Yoo, it's been a while since yesterday.
Though there are some faces here that weren't there yesterday too?

name: Jagannath
text:
You've probably heard, but I'm Officer Jagannath.
And this is my partner candidate, [Player]. Nice to meet ya?

options.text: I'm a non-scary officer.
The new faces are cute too.
Nice to meet ya, brats!

name: Color Gang
text:
(Uwa, the weird cop's subordinate is also weird...
Anyway, what are they planning?)

name: Color Gang
text:
(In any case, a cop's a cop, and being weird just
makes them more troublesome. Don't let your guard down!)

options.text: I can imagine what they're saying.
Seriously, what 'are' we planning?
By the way, have you seen Asakusa's General Manager?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Color Gang
dialogue_after_selection.text:
D-Don't talk to us, you weird subordinate!
Even if we had seen him, we wouldn't tell someone like you!!

name: Jagannath
text:
—And besides, I got to eavesdrop a bit.
Are you arguing over who should ride the float in tonight's 'Float Parade'?

name: Jagannath
text:
You should just ride it yourself.
They look up to you, so answer their feelings, Kirito.

name: Kirito
text:
Pardon? Was there some kind of relationship between you and me that
I didn't know about? Your sense of distance is a bit skewed, isn't it?

name: Jinn
text:
...Hey. Are you— not attending school either?
That hideout of yours, it's a safe place, right?

name: Jinn
text:
Even with Baphomet-sensei there, if children
like you are staying in a dangerous place, then I...

name: Kirito
text:
...Is that guy over there a teacher?
Ah, I should've guessed... He's so pushy.

name: Kirito
text:
You're exactly like the type I hate most.
I thought maybe you were 'copying' them or something.

name: Kirito
text:
Both are the annoying, bothersome types who can't read the room...
Well, if you could read the room, you wouldn't be a cop, nor a teacher.

name: Jinn
text: (G... Grrrrrrrrrrr!!)

name: Jinn
text:
...Y-You've got quite a sharp knife there.
But, something like that won't— Guh...

options.text: It's so sharp it hurts everything it touches...!
Jinn-sensei, stay strong...!
Hey, that's rude!

name: Color Gang
text:
(Uge... that one's a teacher. I thought the Fighting Festival
would let me avoid dealing with those kinds of people...)

name: Color Gang
text:
(Anyway, shut up. We don't know what they're
thinking, and Baphomet told us to stay quiet...!)

name: Jagannath
text:
Kirito. You were made Vice-Head against your will, right?
You've gotten yourself into a boat— No, a float would be better.

name: Jagannath
text:
And besides, it's their very first match. Do try to understand them.
For the brats, it's only natural they'd want to put the
'big brother' they've recognized on the float to get their spirits up.

Words that seemed to speak for their own hearts.
The boys unintentionally look up and stare at Jagannath.

name: Kirito
text:
...Hah? That's precise why I said that I'm done with that kind of 'playing',
and I'm not the 'big brother' everyone's telling me to be. Were you even listening?

name: Kirito
text:
And besides, it's not like they wanted me.
They just gathered around me because they had nowhere else to go—

Kirito stops his words, for the gazes that were gathering on him.
Gazes that carried something. Baphomet quietly tells the silent Kirito.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Kirito-sama, I know you dislike it when I am meddling.
But would it be a bit different if it were these children's words?

Eyes mixed with a faint sorrow and a strong wish.
Eventually, Kirito looked away, trying to escape from his situation.

name: Kirito
text:
...Hah. Fine, I'll ride it.
It's not a big deal. We won't win anyway.

'I have no intention of playing the game'.
Despite having that preamble, Kirito gave in.

name: All Four
text:
...!! Hey, you just said you'd ride it!
Haha, no takebacks!

name: Kirito
text:
Yes, yes, can you not make such a fuss over this?
Let's go. You want to get away from these people too, don't you?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh, good luck. We'll go watch tonight too.
We'll be cheering for you guys!

options.text: Good luck!
I'm glad Kirito decided to participate.
Do your best, ya brats!!

name: Color Gang
text:
S-Shut up! Like... we needed you guys to cheer for us!
Don't go around loitering, cops!

name: Color Gang
text:
Though... Well...
Loitering is fine, but just leave us alone!

Jagannath laughs cheerfully at the color gang as they
leave while leaving a half-hearted 'toughness' behind.

In that relaxed air, there was only one person who was
pensively clouding their expression while watching their backs.

name: Jinn
text:
...Those kinds of people are bad
at relying on others— Especially adults.

name: Jinn
text:
They might have the experience of not being helped despite relying on someone,
or they might be acting tough because of the idea that relying on people is uncool.

name: Jinn
text:
To be honest, a teacher like me is often
at a loss on how to interact with them...

name: Baphomet
text:
...I see you understand, Jinn-sensei.
That is one of their problems. That is why I—

name: Jagannath
text:
You wanted them to participate in this festival.
I see, you really do understand those 'bad brats', don't you?

As Baphomet softly shook her head and
was about to say something with a modest smile—

name: Y'golonac
text:
—Whoa!?
What is this exceptionally wicked presence...!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
This is definitely a presence
aiming for [Player]— I won't let you—!!

Moving almost purely on instinct, Y'golonac receives
the evil hand approaching [Player] with his own giant body.

name: Hogen
text:
—Oho!? Well done, that was a splendid move.
And this selfish elasticity... One could call it a truly alluring, ripe specimen.

name: Y'golonac
text:
W-Well, Uncle 'is' the No. 2 host, after all?
It's only natural for me to have an alluring body...
Wait, that's not it—!!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Why are you appearing out of nowhere
trying to touch my [Player] so casually, you geezer!?

name: Baphomet
text:
M-Might you be Jagannath-sama's colleague...?
But that presence and devil within you, could it be that you are...!

options.text: Hogen~!!
Is that the only way you can appear!?
(Hide behind Y'golonac)

name: Hogen
text:
Fufufu, I was watching your interactions from a distance,
and they were truly easy-to-understand bad brats.

name: Hogen
text:
It seems my choice was correct after all.
This case was perfect for you, Jagannath.

name: Baphomet
text:
Choice... Which means this person was the one
who sent Jagannath-sama and [Player]-sama here.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Hey, putting aside putting in security,
I didn't hear that you'd be coming yourself.

name: Jagannath
text:
We avoid having the headquarters' intervening until the end of the festival.
The plan is for us to 'thoroughly' proceed with the investigation.

name: Jagannath
text:
Anyway, you could understand from just seeing them, right?
Those guys just need a little bit of time.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, don't be so hasty...
I have no intention of interfering with the scene.
I just came to take a peek at how things were.

name: Hogen
text:
And besides, I'm suppressing the headquarters' movements as much as possible, you know?
Though I can't guarantee how long I can keep our lovely Chief Daikoku suppressed.

name: Jagannath
text:
Ugh, that's not hard to imagine, so it's hard to complain...
I'll be counting on you, Hogen.

name: Baphomet
text:
...Jagannath-sama.
As I thought, you are...

Baphomet seemed to have expected it from his actions so far,
but she gasped upon hearing the investigation policy.

name: Hogen
text:
Anyway. My appearing before you like this is
half for public reasons and half for private ones.

name: Jagannath
text:
—Huh?
What's that other matter you're talking about?

It was Baphomet who spoke
before waiting for Hogen's answer.

name: Baphomet
text:
...It is about Sanat Kumara-sama, is it not?
The devil inhabiting your hearts, its existence is so...

name: Hogen
text:
Oho, so you understand?
I see, so you've been bundling those bad brats with that power?

name: Hogen
text:
Umu, so I was correct. That's why I thought I'd face it.
Or you could say— the 'immaturity of youth'?

name: Hogen
text:
Well now, for that reason, shall I
also be accompanying you guys, [Player]?

name: Kirito
text:
...I see. So the reason the police headquarters' movements are
so slow even in this situation is because of 'that police officer'.

name: Kirito
text:
Baphomet-san probably noticed, but to those
idiots, they're probably still just 'strange cops'.

name: Kirito
text:
Well, they 'are' that, but they probably
haven't realized that 'that's not all' yet.

For a while, he looks into empty space and ponders.
Soon after— With a cynical smile, he mutters to himself.

name: Kirito
text:
...Hmmm.
Big brother, huh.

name: Kirito
text:
—Well, if I feel like it,
maybe I'll tell them what I just saw?

name: Kirito
text:
I don't know what will happen then,
but I'm a little bit interested myself.

name: Kirito
text:
Some people don't play the game from the starting line.
I wonder... what will they do to an opponent like that?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Heh. To think that I would make such a pathetic,
unsightly flight before the enemy...

Sanat Kumara stared silently at the setting sun.
Then, he suddenly let out a booming shout.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Uoooooooooohhhhhhhhh!!
But this defeat is precisely why I must leave Umamichi!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I shall cast everything aside and start over!
And from a new land, I will guide the youth!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
But... Where on earth
should I go? Mmm...!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
A new youth... The way of life for the youth of
Yoyogi Academy is beautiful in a different way from Umamichi.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
From General Manager to... Team Captain?
For example, what if I were to guide the youth as the Captain of the Kendo Club?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hahaha! Another day of shedding the refreshing sweat of youth!
I shall surely lead our Kendo Club to victory!!

name: Gunzo
text:
You're fired up today too, Sanat-senpai.
We in the Rugby Club can't afford to lose either!

name: Durga
text:
It's actually quite stimulating.
Aiming for the heights is something I can really relate to.

name: Kyuma
text:
I really want to learn from that heat.
I need to put that much passion and soul into every single ball...!

options.text: Yoyogi definitely seems to suit him.
Sanat-senpai, I want to see you as the Kendo Club Captain!
His mental image of the Yoyogi members is surprisingly accurate...?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Or perhaps there's a way to guide through creative work.
I hear the youth of Akihabara Academy improve themselves and others through creation.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Indeed, reproducible creative works would have a broad influence.
Depending on how it's done, I might even be able to guide the people of all Tokyo.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I shall write down my experiences without holding anything back!
With my own hand, I will weave a poem of the century!!

name: Vapula
text:
T-This is what 'emotional' feels like-pura!?
Alright, I'll follow your lead... Pupupu, prapra~!

name: Enigma
text:
You and I, let us evolve this incompetent human race together!
I shall encrypt and protect that pure-heartedness of yours myself.

name: Hecate
text:
C-C-Could it be!? Is this a pairing between this tiger and this
young man!? But, I'm sure by this point, they'd have already...
Wait, your face is beet red, are you okay?

options.text: Akihabara is a surprisingly high-potential choice.
Sanat-senpai, you being a calligrapher isn't half bad!
It seems like he'd be pushed around a lot there.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
No, perhaps becoming a charismatic figure in
Nakano and increasing my own influence is also an option.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
In that case, would the royal road be to put my own guidances into song?
I did hear songs can support and lift those who have lost their way.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
You all, you have done well gathering here!
Heed my words, the very roar of my soul!!

name: Leannan Sidhe
text:
Amazing, Sanat! If you polish that soulful singing voice,
you'll surely reach even greater heights... Wait, isn't that your goal!?

name: Amduscias
text:
T-Then, please, become my producer!
I'm currently training in the underground, but I'm aiming for the top of Tokyo!

name: Teda
text:
Nyahahahaha! It is not painful, not painful at all!
I shall permit you to devote yourself so that this
Teda-sama can shine higher than anyone else!

options.text: Being a wall for popular idols seems difficult.
Sanat-senpai, I'm looking forward to you as a vocalist!
I'll go to every single concert!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Umu... all of them are unexpectedly good.
Among them, I feel a definite potential in the 'me' that is at Yoyogi.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Indeed, I can likely guide my juniors no matter where I am.
But— What is this feeling!? Something is wrong, something is...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
When I push it to the limit, I can only be satisfied with
the 'me' at Umamichi! Why is that!? Uoooooohh!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
But, putting that aside... Why is it?
I feel strangely filled with a sense of affirmation,
as if my motivation is being cheered on—

options.text: Now you're just being a bit too dense.
Snap out of it, Sanat-senpai!!
Am I really that invisible...?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—What!? [Player]!?
Since when were you there!?

About an hour ago— [Player]'s group, who had decided to search
further by splitting up, finally found the target of their search.

options.text: I just found you a moment ago.
I've already informed everyone else.
(Use your device to contact that you've found Sanat)

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hmph. Laugh if you so wish to, [Player].
For right now, I have exposed my lost and wandering self to you.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I feel it was a part of me I wanted to hide from you above all...
But now that it's come to this, some part of me feels it couldn't be helped if it's you.

options.text: I'll listen to your troubles if you'd like.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Really!?
...No, as a senior to those guys, I must overcome a worry of this level alone, or I won't be able to face them.

options.text: To be honest, I'm wandering too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh? Does that have anything to do with the fact that you've formed a buddy partnership with 'someone from somewhere new'?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No matter who it is, wouldn't they be far more suited to being the General Manager of Umamichi than someone like me?
Ugh...

options.text: I'm happy to get to know this side of you, Sanat-senpai.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...! Even you would say such a thing...!
Honestly, what do you hope to gain by knowing about me?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Haa...
Since the festival began, I've done nothing but show a pathetic side to my juniors.
I can't face them.

text:
Sanat Kumara has completely lost his confidence.
He ponders various things, struggling to find his next path—

options.text: Despite everything, you're still worried about Umamichi, aren't you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Does it look that way?
I was just wondering the same thing myself—
Hmm?

options.text: Are you really going somewhere other than Umamichi?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, that is my intention!
It is my intention, but...
Since you've asked that, perhaps it doesn't look that way, after all.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I was just wondering the same thing myself.
Hey, [Player], could it be that I—

options.text: You'd do well anywhere, Senpai.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Is that... so?
If that's what you say, then perhaps it is.
Then what could I be hesitating for—

text:
There, Sanat Kumara noticed a familiar group
running towards them at full dash from afar.

name: Licho
text:
—Ooh, you were seriously in a place this far away!
Seriously, how far did you run, General Manager!?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
I'm drenched in sweat from searching around even though it's winter!
Gah, I want to go wash it off soon!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Even all of you followed me.
To go that far just to put me on the float...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
But I should have told you, I have no qualification to ride the float!
Above all, the idea of me being 'pushed up' by you all is out of the question!

name: Motosumi
text:
No, that's why we're telling you too!? It's not about the float!
We're talking about wanting you to reconsider stepping down as General Manager!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Kakaka! Splendidly not listening to anything, as usual.
Now, to do something about Sanat when he's like this— Oh.

At that moment, slightly after the Umamichi group,
the rest of [Player]'s group arrived at the scene.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh, you're good at finding people, [Player].
Should I have you help out with the traffic department's patrol next time?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Even you, Jagannath...! Don't tell me—
You came here seeking a match against me after I fled!?

name: Jagannath
text:
...No. Just consider that I only moved
because the folks at Umamichi asked me to.

name: Jagannath
text:
Besides, even though you've looked at me many times, that's your reaction?
Isn't there something else, y'know, you should say?

name: Jagannath
text:
Ah, you... You aren't putting out your ethereal body?
Then it's only natural if you don't understand... Isn't it?

name: Jagannath
text:
Well, the 'me' right now isn't the same
'me' from back when I was in Devaloka.

name: Jagannath
text:
...Ahem. No, don't worry about it.
Anyway, sorry for getting carried away with the bad mood earlier.

name: Jinn
text:
For some reason, I also felt a sudden, intense
urge to help you and pressed in on you forcefully.
But if you need help, I'll be there for you anytime!

options.text: Is this a pickup line...?
Jinn-sensei, you're acting strange...
Teach, you're being more pushy than usual today.

name: Y'golonac
text:
For that reason, we won't let you escape again, Sanat-chan?
Now, stay still and let yourself fall into Uncle's evil hands—

name: Baphomet
text:
—Ahem. Y'golonac-sama, could you stop there?
It is clearly having the opposite effect.

name: Baphomet
text:
...And please, let me also apologize once more.
I... I have an interest that is 'too strong' in the devils inhabiting people.

name: Baphomet
text:
Only by observing that can I grasp my own true form...
I felt that way and, shamefully, I immersed myself in it without realizing.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Baphomet, there is no need for you to apologize.
I simply succumbed on my own and exposed my shameful state on my own.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
If we are to trace the responsibility...
It would be in my own weakness.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, such a kind person. To shield such a shameless me...
I found myself feeling quite charmed, in spite of myself.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Ngh. But if possible!
I would appreciate it if you could refrain from 'that kind of thing'.

name: Motosumi
text:
—Anyway, I've been curious since a while ago.
Who's that old man who looks like some high-ranking police officer?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—!? W-What!!?
You are...

name: Hogen
text:
What's this, you never noticed? Fufu.
Your heart isn't in it, so you're still immature.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, as for facing each other like this...
If my memory isn't lacking, this is our first time, isn't it?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—Yes. I don't remember.
'Even if I were to search through all my memories'.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Since we haven't ever met until now,
I thought you would never show your face before me.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Meaning, if there was no reason for you to avoid me,
we would surely have met somewhere.

name: Hogen
text:
Ah, that's right. Indeed, I was avoiding you.
And there is, of course, a reason for that.

name: Jagannath
text:
...? What's the deal, Hogen?
Hurry up and explain so we can understand.

name: Baphomet
text:
—Indeed, it is just as I thought.
The devils inhabiting both of you are far too complementary.

name: Baphomet
text:
Very close, yet their forms are as different as the front and back of a coin.
In other words— Sanat Kumara-sama is Hogen-sama's 'shadow'.

name: Y'golonac
text:
What!? Their vibes are definitely different, but if you squint,
they could almost look like grandfather and grandson...!?

name: Hogen
text:
It's not just that they look similar?
When I was younger, I had a temperament much closer to this fellow.

options.text: You can't be kidding!?
Does that mean your personality changed completely...?
So Sanat-senpai will end up like this in the future too—

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, people do change. Especially, after
encountering an event that prompts a decisive transformation.

name: Hogen
text:
Whether you want to or not, once you've
passed that point, there's no turning back—

name: Hogen
text:
Those kinds of events visit people sometimes,
whether they like it or not.

How many were able to notice the serious light that dwelt in those eyes for a split second?
After a blink, the smile had already returned.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, I don't think I was as stiff as this one,
and I don't think this one will become a playful dandy like me—

name: Hogen
text:
Even so, there is a strong possibility
that our paths will diverge.

name: Hogen
text:
...That divergence is, namely,
whether one accepts reincarnation or not.

name: Hogen
text:
Or one could put it this way...
Whether to participate in this repeating 'Game', or not.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Let me ask you, Hogen.
Why did you appear before me now, at this time?

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm, exactly what I just said is the reason.
It would be painful to see a man who is the spitting
image of my former self make the same mistake I did.

name: Hogen
text:
It's just a bit of 'grandmotherly' concern...
Or rather, the grandfatherly concern that moved me?

name: Licho
text:
Ooh, I don't know why, but the General Manager is actually listening...!
Maybe this will all settle down peacefully...

name: Gorozaemon
text:
It seems he's actually winning over Sanat with the weight of his age.
Then, well, let's settle this amicably—

name: Gorozaemon
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">By settling it with a battle!!

name: Umamichi Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">W-Why—!?

options.text: I-It's been a while since that came out!
You actually have the most delinquent mindset, don't you?
It's quick and simple, I'm all for it!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Well, I mean, Sanat's 'senior' has come all this way.
Of course I'd want to see which one is on top, right?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Besides, it's simple and clear, perfect for Umamichi, right?
You'll quietly listen to the one who wins— Isn't that right, General Manager?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Clashing fists, huh... Very well.
I also thought that thinking over and over would lead nowhere.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hahaha! Nice, nice!
This is why delinquents are so interesting!

name: Jinn
text:
I see, so this is the Umamichi spirit I've heard rumors about.
Qinglong-sensei must be going through a lot of trouble...

name: Licho
text:
No, no, that's a misunderstanding!
Even for us, it's not that much!?

name: Hogen
text:
The flow became exactly what I hoped for,
but are you sure I'm the opponent you wanted to face?
—You'll regret it, you know?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Hogen. I am far younger and stronger than you.
And furthermore— 'I possess far more experience than you as well'.

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm. Indeed, with your experience value, which could almost be called
abnormal, you could likely gain the upper hand against almost anyone.

name: Hogen
text:
However, there is an exception to everything.
And— I, am likely one of those few exceptions.

name: Hogen
text:
As for the reason... Fufu, you'll likely
understand as soon as we cross blades?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Very well. However,
having just tasted defeat, I cannot hold back.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And after I defeat Hogen— Baphomet, it is your turn!
Right here and now, I shall fulfill my revenge from yesterday—!!

name: Baphomet
text:
Eh, me as well— Is it?
Sanat Kumara-sama, if you so wish, I will face you, but...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
If anything, I don't mind adding Y'golonac as well.
He is my natural enemy who pushes me to the heights, I must face him eventually!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Whoa, you're seriously super serious.
But... Uncle likes someone like you the most to bring down?

At the sight of Sanat Kumara gradually regaining his pace,
relief begins to spread among the Umamichi group as well.

name: Licho
text:
Do it, General Manager!
Show us that our head is the strongest!!

options.text: Wait, whether he wins or loses...
If he wins against everyone, there'll be no reason for him to quit, right?
What a crafty old man.

name: Hogen
text:
Good grief, it's as if I'm not even in your sights.
Even though I'm still very much active, and making quite a stir day and night.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, if you lose to me, you are to listen to what these guys have to say.
And of course— To the voice of your own heart as well, alright?

Sanat nods. With this, everything would be settled no matter what—
But just as everyone was catching their breath, the situation moved in an unexpected direction.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Then, let me speak of what happens if I am victorious.
Naturally, there should be a reward on my side as well, right?

name: Hogen
text:
—Well, that's only natural. So, what do you desire?
Mmm, if it's about unfamiliar romance, I can guide you step by step?

name: Hogen
text:
Training my younger self in various things is quite exciting in its own way.
How about it, shall we climb the stairs of adulthood together...?

It was a verbal attack born from knowing his weakness.
But, Sanat did not show a hint of agitation,
and resolutely pointed to an unexpected person.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
If I win—
Jagannath. I shall take you into Umamichi.
Stand in my place as General Manager.

options.text: Eeeeeehhhh!?
He still planned on quitting—!?

name: Hogen
text:
Now wait. Even if I'm of a higher rank,
for me to approve something like that is—

name: Jagannath
text: —I don't mind.

options.text: W-Wait a minute, Jagannath!?
So easily...
(Don't say anything and let him handle it)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Jagannath
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thanks.
You seem to trust my steering, then.

name: Jagannath
text:
This must be a very important turning point for Sanat.
Then, it would be rude not to be prepared for a proper clashing of blows.

name: Jagannath
text:
However, I'm going to participate in that battle as well.
I can't have things decided in a place where I'm not involved.

name: Jagannath
text:
Sanat, you pick a tag partner too.
Pick someone special you can entrust your fate— Your back to.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...No need. This is my fight.
It has no meaning unless I achieve victory with my own strength.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Besides, in this fight, my juniors are surely wishing for my defeat.
Then, I must once again overturn this adversity alone.

'That's not it—', Sanat Kumara silenced Licho and the
others, who were about to argue, with a single glance.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Do not interfere, and just watch.
This is the final fight of Sanat Kumara,
the General Manager of Umamichi Academy.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...If anything, [Player]. You are welcome to join in and try
to protect the position of your 'senior officer'.

options.text: Eh!? Is that okay!?
I don't think we'd lose a 3v1, but...
...I won't hold back, because I can't afford to lose.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hey now, you're seriously looking down on us.
If you're going to look down on us this much, it has to be a one-on-one!

name: Jagannath
text:
...But that's not how it's gonna go.
Never lose sight of the 'grand purpose'.
Sorry, but we'll be taking you down three-against-one.

name: Hogen
text:
Now, let us begin. The tengu of Mount Kurama, Kiichi Hogen—
I, and no other, shall guide you, Sanat Kumara!
Battle Start

name: Sanat Kumara
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">—Mun!!

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, that won't reach. I am a master of handling distance.
Especially when it comes to measuring the distance between me and you.

name: Licho
text:
S-Seriously, even though it's three-against-one,
the serious Sanat-senpai is being pressed back!?
The movement of that old man named Hogen... is changing rapidly!?

name: Y'golonac
text:
It's actually quite some nasty movement. If he hadn't put out that
evil aura earlier, I might not have made it in time to guard [Player]'s chastity.

name: Jinn
text:
And he's fighting with a truly exquisite sense of distance, neither too close nor too far.
He must be as difficult to deal with as an opponent made of formless smoke.

name: Baphomet
text:
This is... What is known as 'truth and falsehood,' is it not?
'Showing distance when close, showing closeness when distant'—

name: Hogen
text:
Indeed. A good fighter manages the opponent and is not managed by them—
Always choosing a favorable position, securing distance, and making the opponent move.

name: Hogen
text:
The secret of 'strategy' is, namely, positioning.
A battle is won by the one who controls the distance.

name: Hogen
text:
Your positioning is also splendid, but it's a bit too honest.
Furthermore, we can form a fluid formation with three people, you see?

name: Gorozaemon
text:
That's not all. I couldn't imagine Sanat being at a
disadvantage even three-against-one, but—
I see, I'm convinced now.

name: Gorozaemon
text:
It's nothing complicated, that Jagannath is simply an extraordinary person.
He's quite a monster, worthy of being evaluated as a General Manager.

name: Hogen
text:
Exactly. These two are my beloved disciples who have received my direct teaching.
Now, take advantage of the opening I've created, [Player]!

options.text: Roger, Master!
(Match your movements to Hogen's)
I don't remember ever having that.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heheh. I don't remember becoming your disciple, but well,
it's a fact that you worked me hard at the Police Academy!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Mgh, playing around with me...!
Do you plan to chip away at me with such deceptive tactics!?

name: Hogen
text:
And, positioning is important
not just in battle—

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, it might be an option to learn from Jagannath's stance?
He's good at positioning, not just in battle, but 'beyond it' as well.

name: Hogen
text:
He's a man who lives 'warfare is the way of deception',
standing at a psychological and physical advantage by switching between light and dark.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, there are still times where 'that switching becomes a weakness',
but in any case, it would be a great reference for you right now.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Ehh, don't talk nonsense in the middle of a battle!
Did you come to trade words instead of swords or fists!?

He makes a sharp flash with his sword emitting ethereal light.
It's a splendid stroke, but it fails to reach by a hair's breadth.

name: Hogen
text:
Indeed, you are still green. Because you are one destined for stagnation,
your mental structure cannot escape that of a youth.

name: Hogen
text:
In terms of experience value, for some reason you far surpass me.
But, my experience has been built up in this body that has marked the passage of time.

name: Hogen
text:
Sanat Kumara. You are on the path I once walked.
And— You are about to make the same mistake I did.

Sanat delivers a series of slashes that would surely be the end
of the fight if they even grazed, and the tip of his sword touches Hogen's white hair.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—What was that past mistake!?
Tell me before my sword reaches you, Hogen!!

name: Hogen
text:
...Cutting off distance. That is to say,
I have made a mistake by 'cutting off relationships'.

name: Hogen
text:
Letting someone who looks so much like my former self follow the same path...
I'll be honest, I 'personally' do not want to see that.

name: Hogen
text:
I simply couldn't avoid it.
Because my 'Rule' is exactly that of cutting distance.

name: Hogen
text:
But yours is my opposite—
You can 'obtain connections with others'.

name: Hogen
text:
Then you can do what I could not.
You can reach a future different from mine!!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
What you're spouting is too roundabout to understand!
But— It makes me angry that I can't just dismiss it!!

His attacks gain even more momentum.
They are straightforward slashes without any trickery,
but that momentum itself is a major threat.

name: Jagannath
text:
Phew, he's really at it. With him raging around with
that stamina, you can't even hope to get close to him.

options.text: Do you really want to go to another place, senior?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—That point is not particularly important.
What's important is, ultimately, the existence of all of you.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text: Yes, if my 'mission' to lead you to the heights is fulfilled, there is no need at all for the one mediating that to be me!

options.text: You seemed so happy when you were at Umamichi.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes, it is as you say.
But it is certainly not something that should be prioritized over the great 'mission' of leading you all to the heights.

options.text: What about your own wish, Sanat-senpai?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
My wish? That's already decided.
It is for every single one of you to surpass me and reach the heights.

name: Jagannath
text:
Hah! That stance of not seeking anything in return is admirable, but your current
state is rather an abandonment of your place of belonging, Sanat Kumara!

name: Jagannath
text:
I'll make you realize just how much
your eyes have been clouded with my fist!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Guaah!? ...You're good, but you aren't there just yet!
The Umamichi General Manager won't fall from just this!

name: Jagannath
text:
Too soft!? As if my punches would end with just one?
After the right fist hits, next is the left,
finishing it with a One-Two-Jagan!!

Just before the silver-white fist hits Sanat Kumara—
The Umamichi group threw themselves in the way.

name: Jagannath
text:
Huh, what's this!? My punch stopped...
Is it some kind of 'Rule'?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...Licho! You guys!
I should have told you not to interfere...!!

name: Motosumi
text:
Are you dumb!? When you're in that much of a pinch,
there's no way in hell we're letting you fight on your own!

name: Licho
text:
That's right! Sanat-senpai, we want you to be our General Manager...
So we can't just stand by and let you get yourself in trouble!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
You guys...! I didn't ask for this!
It's not like I'd be happy about it...!!

name: Sarutahiko
text:
General Manager, are you hurt!?
If there's any place that hurts, tell me!

name: Gorozaemon
text:
Well, for that reason, we'll be counting on
five-against-three from here. You won't call it unfair, will you?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Then Uncle will stand on [Player]'s side.
Uncle'll make every single one of you into Uncle's babies!

name: Jinn
text:
Then I'll also be on [Player]'s...
But is there any need to fight further in this situation?

name: Jinn
text:
The answer is likely already out of the bag.
The wish rising from within you is a noble one.
There is no need to suppress it!

name: Y'golonac
text:
It doesn't even have to be noble, you know?
Even if it's complete selfishness, Uncle will push you on the back?

Sanat looks at the Umamichi group who have become a wall to protect him.
He should be exposing his shameful state, yet their eyes were filled with burning trust.

name: Licho
text:
Sanat-senpai, if you absolutely wanted to leave Umamichi,
we might not have the right to stop you.

name: Licho
text:
But if you feel even a millimeter of
wanting to be our General Manager, then stay with us!

name: Licho
text:
Let us hear your heart's desire from your soul— Your naked heart!!
If you'd still choose another 'path' after that, I won't say anything more.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
My own wish, my 'path'...
But that is strictly something that should accompany my 'mission'...!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
My... naked heart?
I... I...!

A split second of hesitation— How much conflict was there within him?
Eventually, Sanat raised his chin sharply and clearly showed his determination.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I might be unfit to be the General Manager!
Since, I have known defeat and have even embraced hesitation.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
But even so— If it can be granted,
please let me remain as 'your General Manager'!!

A soul's cry echoed through the area, and immediately
following it, the dry sound of someone sheathing their sword resonated.

name: Hogen
text:
Phew, it seems you've finally realized.
Good grief, I'm just about at my limit.

Hogen rubs his shoulder as if it were a heavy task.
Sanat glares at him without moving an inch.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
—You, you're planning to let me win on purpose.
Do you think I'd be happy to receive such treatment?

name: Hogen
text:
Fighting you after you've cut through your hesitation in anything but a short
battle would be tough even for me. Indeed, I don't want to get old...

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...You didn't mean a single word of that sentence.
I feel like I'm being shown my own haughty self through a mirror.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...No. You had a loss that was enough
to break that haughty nose, didn't you?

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm? No, well, thinking about it carefully,
I might have always been like this?

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh, what a crafty old man.
'Managing others and not being managed by others', indeed.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, if I lost to you while you weren't even using
your 'Privilege', my long years of study would cry. Kaka.

Sanat turns back to his Umamichi companions.
They, too, were looking straight at their General Manager.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
You all... I thank you deeply for once again
accepting me after I was so unsightly defeated.

name: Motosumi
text:
Honestly, our General Manager is completely out of touch.
Everyone loses in a fight sometimes!

name: Motosumi
text:
If anything, this just means that new
rivals for the General Manager have appeared, right?

name: Sarutahiko
text:
Ah, that's right. Besides, isn't it simply a good thing
for the General Manager to have someone he can call a rival?

name: Licho
text:
Besides, no one but Sanat-senpai can pull Umamichi together!
If the Vice-Head became the General Manager... Ugh, that's too much impossible~

name: Gorozaemon
text:
I'm absolutely not interested in being the General Manager!
Thanks to you, I can do whatever I please, and I am plenty satisfied with my current position!

Sanat Kumara's cheeks unknowingly softened at the exchange,
which was very typical of the Asakusa group.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...What is this feeling?
This sensation of warm blood circulating through my entire body.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I see. Including those who aren't here now,
from the bottom of my heart, I love the people of Asakusa—

name: Baphomet
text:
...It seems that even without me checking,
Sanat-sama has realized the form of his wish just now.

name: Baphomet
text:
The one and only solid bond in Umamichi Academy...
Perhaps what I should aim for, is similar to that...

Sanat realizes. The reason his former self chose Asakusa was simply
the good compatibility between those who pursued the 'path' and his own 'Role'.

But as the days passed, he had unknowingly come to hold
emotions beyond 'mission' for the land of Asakusa—
For the people living there.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...I see. Do I wish to watch over the future of
my juniors here, even if it means leaving my 'mission' behind?

options.text: That's a nice expression on your face.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry for dragging you along.
But— Thanks to you, I've cleared my head.
As expected of you, my junior!

options.text: Your smile is cute, senior.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Stop, stop that!
Are you trying to make me blush and put an end to my standing as General Manager!?

options.text: You really are dense.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Sanat Kumara
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm sorry for dragging you along.
But— Thanks to you, I've cleared my head.
As expected of you, my junior!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I, Kumaraten, was faster than anyone at running through the world.
Therefore, I had reached the limit before all of you.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
I thought that it was my mission to make you surpass this.
But... It seems I had become haughty.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Yes, I realized it today. That if 'I do not
become an adult', there are sights I cannot see.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...I, who should be the one guiding you,
ended up being guided by all of you today.

name: Jinn
text:
Even a teacher can be taught by their students.
Maybe— I'm being taught all the time.

name: Jagannath
text:
Anyway, it's fine to have both styles,
the guiding side and the guided side, at the same time, right?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
...I cannot agree with that. I am the one who guides—
Though if Hogen is the opponent, then I am a child, so it can't be helped.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And the same goes for all of you in Umamichi.
Perhaps it's not so bad to be supported by my beloved juniors sometimes.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
From now on too— I look forward to your continued
support of me, Sanat Kumara, your Umamichi General Manager!

name: Umamichi Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 140%">Roger!!!!

Hogen looked into the distance as he watched that scene.
He saw a 'possibility' through the man who so closely resembled his former self.

name: Hogen
text:
Fufu, what a beautiful blue spring. Even in the middle of
a freezing winter, that scene could be called a dazzling spring itself.

To obtain connections with others— If only I had such an 'Rule',
perhaps I could have kept from losing what was precious to me.

A familiar loneliness momentarily strikes his chest.
Then, the old man mutters softly to himself.

name: Hogen
text:
...But even if I were to regret deeply,
this 'path' that I have walked is a certain one.

name: Hogen
text:
And— This future I have arrived at is also something in its own right.
I must acknowledge that I have done my best, on top of everything.

name: Hogen
text:
But in any case, I feel somewhat saved right now.
After all, I was able to help protect a 'possibility',
a path that I myself could not tread.

options.text: Thank you, Hogen.
You're more than just a perverted old man.
You were cool.

name: Hogen
text:
Kakaka, just those words of
yours make it all worthwhile.

name: Hogen
text:
By the way, I'd really love for you to
stay with the police as you are, you know?

options.text: I'll think about it.
Ugh... I'm being squeezed from both sides...!
I'll consider it when you become less of a pervert?

name: Motosumi
text:
...Now then, it's about time for the Float Clash.
You don't have any complaints about being 'pushed up' by us anymore, right?

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Umu, very well. To meet your expectations as
the Umamichi General Manager, I shall ride the float!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
And— If I am to be pushed up by all of you,
I absolutely cannot afford to lose!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Alright, let's put our spirit into it!
Let's show the firm bonds of Umamichi at the Fighting Festival!!

name: Umamichi Members
text: <p2 style="font-size: 150%">Oooooooohhhhhh!!

The sound of bells, flutes, and drums—
At Shoraionji Temple, the beautiful floats decorated with lanterns
and tapestries are now fiercely competing with one another.
I'll just leave the term be since I don't exactly know how to dissect it... (小雷音寺)

Spirit clashing with spirit alongside the sound of creaking wheels.
The riders strike large drums on the upper tier to urge the pullers forward.

name: Suzuka
text:
Everyone, push back with everything you've got!! For all of us in Kichorabu—
We have to snatch a win in this night program first!

name: Y'golonac
text:
Phew, phew, it's a bit hard for Uncle...
But shouting like this starts to become fun, doesn't it?

name: Y'golonac
text:
Ah, [Player], are you watching~?
Uncle is working hard by pushing his plump body to the limit~!

name: Y'golonac
text:
—Heave! Ho~!!
Hihihi, wouldn't you say Uncle have some amazing charm right now?

name: Shino
text:
What, where are they!? Please watch over my struggle until
the end, with the resolution of a falling peony flower!!

options.text: Both of you look great in your fundoshi!
Whoa, it's shaking so much, I should keep my silence.
You can do it, Shinoー!!

name: Nobuharu
text:
I won't lose to anyone when it comes to cheering or drums!
Vice-Head of the Shibamata Teijashu group!
I, Takeda Nobuharu will fire everyone up!!

name: Nobuharu
text:
—En-ya! En-ya!!
—Sei-ya! Sei-ya!!!

name: Taishakuten
text:
As expected of the cheering squad, the drum sound
resonates in my gut as much as a thunderbolt! I'm getting fired up!!

name: Ifrit
text:
I'll make you boil with even more heat!
Nobuharu, that's not the best you can do, right!?

name: Ifrit
text:
I wondered what it was when I was invited, but it's super hot!
As a fellow genie, I can't lose to uncle Jinn, can I!?

options.text: The heat is amazing...!
Jinn-sensei... was your uncle?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ifrit
dialogue_after_selection.text:
He's more like a closely related uncle of the same race as mine!
After all, us in Garodemann are all about binary choices!!

options.text: The shouts are great~ So cool!

name: Kirito
text:
Aah, I never really wanted to represent Ikebukuro, and yet...
...By the way, isn't this float shaking a bit too much?

name: Color Gang
text:
We can't help it, it's heavy!
Anyway, it's a clashing contest, so of course it's gonna shake!

name: Color Gang
text:
Hehehe, we're gonna clash hard, so be prepared!
Also, you look quite good striking the drums!

options.text: Ooh, he's looking the part.
Kirito, you're so cool~
Do your best, ya brats!

name: Kirito
text:
...Hmph. To cheer for someone
like us, you really seem to be carefree.

And the final float, which bore the heat of unity—
Indeed, it was the one of the Asakusa group led by Sanat Kumara.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
The heat swirling in the cold air, sweat turning to steam, heroic footsteps,
ropes tightening, the vibration of clashing... Everything here only rouses me further!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Head of the Asokenkai and General Manager of Umamichi Academy, Sanat Kumara!
I shall surely seize our first victory at this Fighting Festival that Asakusa is proud of!

name: Licho
text:
Heheh, I'm happy you're back at your best!
Let us strike while the iron is hot!!

name: Jinn
text:
Uoooooooooohhh!! [Player], can you see how
amazing your assistant homeroom teacher is!?

options.text: Sanat-senpai, you're looking lively.
Jinn-sensei, you're so cool!
I can't take it anymore, I'm joining in!

name: Hogen
text:
Fufufu, that simplicity is also enviable. It's a bit embarrassing,
but now that I got to see him like this, he's actually quite cute.

name: Hogen
text:
...No, is that actually a rather
problematic expression to use for that man?

name: Jagannath
text:
Kirito and the brats are actually doing their best!
Too bad for Baphomet though, she should have stayed until the end.

For a split second from atop the float, Sanat looks joyfully at those he has recognized as rivals—
As if it was to say to them to 'watch my performance'.

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Hahaha! Go!
Our indomitable float, the pride of us Umamichi!

name: Sanat Kumara
text:
Pull the ropes with all your strength, clash your hot youth together, and—
Eventually, at the end of the intersecting 'paths', aim for the heights!!

That burning cry, the shouts of each group, and the cheers
of the crowd were absorbed into the clear night sky.

Supported by his beloved companions— The companions he had chose himself,
the General Manager strikes the large drum with his white teeth and breaths visible—
